summary:
This mod adds 3 standalone female followers.
by toyomicat.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/66706-0-1436920170.jpg[/img]

[color=#b6b6b6][size=5][b]Others followers-------------------------------------
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61830/?][b][size=5]Barbarian Sunya Follower[/size][/b][/url]

[/b][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61889/?][b][size=5]Ranger Tris Follower[/size][/b][/url][b][size=4]
[/size][/b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61889/?][b][img]https://40.media.tumblr.com/8c52c96ee77b2667a626c2b5f30886f2/tumblr_nimroa47MD1tjo6nbo4_r1_540.jpg[/img][/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62252/?][size=5][b]Demon Hunter Vera Follower[/b][/size][/url]

[b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63536/?]Sue Follower[/url][/size][/b]

[b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67358/?]Lane Follower[/url]
[/size][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67358/?][img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/d3337e9732f07cf0b7d343d1f700d3da/tumblr_nimroa47MD1tjo6nbo6_r1_500.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67812/?][b][size=5]Dark Elf Melissa Follower[/size][/b][/url]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67812/?][img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/2309c33b2a0cef109426243274690646/tumblr_nimroa47MD1tjo6nbo7_r2_500.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68811/?][size=5][b]CLover Follower[/b][/size][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68811/?][size=4][b][img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/5293850790fecad5d1f3965821ef8780/tumblr_nimroa47MD1tjo6nbo8_r1_500.jpg[/img][/b][/size][/url]

[size=4][b]Sorry! It is a machine translation.
I’m not good at English.[/b]

[/size][b][size=4]This mod adds 3 standalone female followers.
by toyomicat.[/size]

[color=#999999][size=5]--Body--[/size][/color]
[size=4]CBBE and UNP.[/size]

[color=#999999][size=5]--Location--[/size][/color]
[size=4]Cecilia - Riften The Bee and Barb.
Eveline - Solitude The Winking Skeever.
Kimi - Windhelm Temple of Talos.[/size]

[color=#999999][size=5]--Introduction--[/size][/color]
[size=4]Standalone followers.
Can marry.

Name - Cecilia.
[b][size=4]Race - Nord.
Combat Style - [/size][/b][b][size=4]Barbarian.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Spells - Voice fire breath.
Perks - Armsman - Fighting stance - Savage strike - Dual savagery
Bladesman - Light foot - Muffled movement.[/size][/b]

[b][size=4][b][size=4]Name -[/size][/b] Eveline.[/size][/b]
[b][size=4]Race - High Elf.
Combat Style - [/size][/b][b][size=4]Spellsword.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Spells - Incinerate - Icy Spear - Healing Hands.
Perks - Silence - Light foot - Stealth - Intense flames - Silent roll
Muffled movement - Augmented flames - Augmented frost.[/size][/b]

[b][size=4]Name - [b][size=4]Kimi[/size][/b].
Race - Nord.
Combat Style - Assassin[/size][/b][b][size=4].
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Spells - Fire breath shout.
Perks - Savage strike - Paralyzing strike - Fighting stance - Light foot
Muffled movement - Armsman - Ovedraw - Agile defender - Stealth - Bladesman - Silent roll.

[b][color=#999999][size=5]--Video--[/size][/color][/b][b][size=4]
[b][size=4]This video by hodilton.
Thanks hodilton.[/size][/b]
[youtube]sNnjLogTDkg[/youtube]
[size=4]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]

author: toyomicat

files.name: Cecilia UNP
files.changelogHtml:
Adds CME save.
Adds UNP Body.
No DLC can also be used.
